name: FourierSeries
short_description:
FourierSeries is a Java application that allows the user to enter the formula for a periodic function. Then, it plots the curve of the function and the curve of the first terms of the Fourier series.
The user can set the number of terms to be displayed, change the value of the Fourier coefficients, and then visualize the new curve.
A sound corresponding to the Fourier Series can be heard.
summary: Java application that plots curves of Fourier series

audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: End Users/Desktop
